text: 8|26|Ara smarana kara, yakhana tomara chile sbalpa sankhyaka, yamine tomara durbala hisebe ganya hate. Tomara asanka karate ye, lokera tomaderake hathat ese dhare niye yabe. Atahpara tini tomaderake asraya dena, nijera sahayya diye tomaderake saktisali karena ebam tomaderake uttama jinisagulo jibikarupe dana karena yate tomara krtajna ha'o.
